title: Taking Notes from Tadej: Jonas Vingegaard Hansen Hints a Giro d’Italia-Tour de France Double Is in His Future
content:
'We'll have to wait and see how Tadej does it': Vingegaard chews over possible Giro-Tour double, but he wants to know if it's achievable first.

Read the full article at Taking Notes from Tadej: Jonas Vingegaard Hansen Hints a Giro d’Italia-Tour de France Double Is in His Future on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
